Developer Terms of Use
des:
This Flash Briefing Skill was created to help you think differently on how you use Voice Marketing for Business and create an actionable plan to connect with customers on the Amazon Alexa platform.

Every day we are discovering unique use cases that are changing the way humans interact with the technology they already have. It’s mission critical for marketers to learn how Amazon Alexa has become a new marketing channel in order to stay relevant as it relates to digital trends.

Your podcast host (Doug Devitre) is no stranger to technology and the user experience. For more than two decades I have been offering digital solutions that have won me the Entrepreneur of the Year from the University of Missouri-Columbia, REBAC Hall of Fame from the National Association of Realtors®, and the Certified Speaking Professional from the National Speakers Association.

As a certified user-experience professional from the Nielsen Norman Group, I can dream up desired customer experiences on the fly, manage the development process from start to finish, and execute a world-class marketing campaign with training alternatives to scale solutions for both entrepreneurs and Fortune 100 companies that drive innovation with urgency.

When you enable the Voice Marketing for Business Flash Briefing, be sure to set a reminder to retrieve the latest episode or create an Alexa Routine that plays the flash briefing skill at a set time whenever you want on any Echo device you own at home or in the office. 

Some podcasts will be more than 10 minutes due to the limitation the Amazon Alexa platform has on Flash Briefings so I encourage you to enable the Doug on Demand skill to play the podcast to you play episodes that are not available on the Flash Briefing Skill.

If you have more questions about the Voice Marketing for Business Flash Briefing Skill you can visit https://voicemarketingforbusiness.com/flash and see the most common ones we receive with specific questions to help you in case you want to start your own flash briefing skill or other customized experiences related to your brand.

If you want to see the future of Voice Marketing for Business I encourage you to enable the Doug on Demand Amazon Alexa skill. Every day we are programming Amazon Alexa to be smarter so that you can have a conversation with me to get what you want, when you want it, and don’t have to spend all day in front of a computer screen.

The Doug on Demand Amazon Alexa skill will help you:

- Play the Voice Marketing for Business Podcast

- Subscribe to the Voice Marketing for Business Podcast in your favorite .mp3 player.

- Get tech tips as it relates to Voice Marketing for Business.

- Opt in to receive email alerts.

- Play Speaker Demo Video 

- Order a copy of my new book.

- Order other resources from Doug’s online store.

Learn more about the Doug on Demand Amazon Alexa skill at https://dougdevitre.com/alexa
